cpl.description: Add a second column to a TiddlyWiki layout using the default layout
cpl.name: Rivers
cpl.readme:
; Rivers : Tiddler can swim in two rivers (two-column mode) : 条目可以在两条河里游动（双栏模式）
This is a custom modification of the [[Stories(v1.0.3)|https://giffmex.org/stroll/stroll.html#%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Fsq%2FStories]] plugin. Changed the plugin name to differentiate.
cpl.title: $:/plugins/xp/rivers
title: xp/rivers
